| icon              = poe2 sword_duskfall_icon.png
| description       = This sword is forged of an Ymyran alloy known as Black Steel. It is particularly well-balanced and sits comfortably in the hand. Black Steel is both lighter and more flexible than traditional steel, giving the blade excellent spring.

| penetration       = 8

| damage            = 17-25

| weapon_focus      =

| rel_items         = 
| rel_abilities     = 
| rel_talents       = 
| internalname      = Sword_U_Duskfall
| location          = * [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), [Valera Estate](/valeraEstate/): Can be acquired from [Atello Valera](/atelloValera/) by either resolving the quest [Family Pride](/familyPride/) quest peacefully, by siding with the Valera family or by siding with the Bardatto family and killing Atello and looting it from his corpse. 
| guid              = 843c6598-a740-4dea-a226-6683b006af56
}}
